survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with current workplace ergonomic setups and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current workstation setup (e.g., desk, chair, monitor height)?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for readability.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current workstation setup (e.g., desk, chair, monitor height)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture common ergonomic issues. Include 'None of the above' to avoid forcing responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional ergonomic equipment or adjustments would improve your work experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

questions.question_text: Has your employer provided any ergonomic training or resources in the past year?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure awareness of employer-provided resources.

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move around during your workday?
